name: Boutique Blend G6
additionalNotes:
"[The] Boutique Blend is our answer to the large ring gauge cigar ... an amazingly complex profile delivered in a full bodied smoke." -- George Rodriquez.  Wrapper: Ecuador Habano/Sumatra Hybrid. Binder: DR Habano.
